channel.title: [PI] NPC Spawn Direction?
channel.description:
How would I go about changing the direction in which my NPCs face?
They seem to all face south.. :confused:

hey super man could you tell me your skype id i got sumthing to tell you . ( VERY IMPORTANTE )

item.title: [PI] NPC Spawn Direction?
item.dc:creator: @Gnartox Gnartox
item.description:
@Gnartox wrote:

imsuperman05:

There’s a face method, I think. But I think it goes off the player’s unique index. Create a face method which faces the npc to a specified x and y pos. Then from there, add an attribute into the configuration file to which direction for them to face, then loop through the array when the server starts up to face the npcs.

Yeah… I don’t really even know where to begin with doing this. I can’t code at all I’m a complete noob. I just started a couple of days ago.

You think its to advanced for me at this point? Because I’ll just leave it alone for now if so…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] NPC Spawn Direction?

@imsuperman05 wrote:

There’s a face method, I think. But I think it goes off the player’s unique index. Create a face method which faces the npc to a specified x and y pos. Then from there, add an attribute into the configuration file to which direction for them to face, then loop through the array when the server starts up to face the npcs.
